objects

Class Ticket

  • java.lang.Object
    • objects.Ticket

  • public class Ticket
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a ticket associated to a one and only seat on a specific flight on an airplane. A passengers can customize the ticket with supplements.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ticket(java.lang.String code)
      Constructs an empty ticket with only the ticket's code.

      Constructs a ticket with the specified informations.
      Ticket(java.lang.String ID, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, int nseat, int classe, java.lang.String codeFlight, double priceFlight)
      Constructs a ticket with the specified informations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ticket

        public Ticket(java.lang.String ID,
              java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String surname,
              int nseat,
              int classe,
              java.lang.String codeFlight,
              double priceFlight)
        Constructs a ticket with the specified informations. CheckIn set to false and no supplements.
        Parameters:
        ID - Number of identity document of the passenger.
        name - Name of the passenger.
        surname - Surname of the passenger.
        nseat - Seat number.
        classe - Class of the seat.
        codeFlight - Code of the flight.
        priceFlight - Price of the flight.

      • Ticket

        public Ticket(java.lang.String code,
              double priceFlight,
              java.lang.String ID,
              java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String surname,
              java.lang.String codeFlight,
              int nseat,
              int codeReservation,
              int classe,
              boolean checkIn)
        Constructs a ticket with the specified informations. No supplements.
        Parameters:
        code - Code of the ticket.
        priceFlight - Price of the ticket.
        ID - Number of identity document of the passenger.
        name - Name of the passenger.
        surname - Surname of the passenger.
        codeFlight - Code of the flight.
        nseat - Seat number.
        codeReservation - Code of the reservation where the ticket is.
        classe - Class of the seat.
        checkIn - It can be set to true if the passenger already did the CheckIn; false otherwise.

      • Ticket

        public Ticket(java.lang.String code)
        Constructs an empty ticket with only the ticket's code.
        Parameters:
        code - Code of the ticket.
